about_the_game:
What is the game about:

This exquisitely crafted first-person horror game immerses you in the journey of a desperate man trying to save his deceased wife. Awakening in a psychiatric hospital, in his quest to revive his dead lover, he is willing to follow the demon's instructions to perform a sacrificial ritual. Explore eerie wards and stay rational amidst the horror. This magic mirror may be the last hope to bring her back. But what he doesn't realize is that the cost of using demonic powers is also great...

Key features:

  • Outstanding atmosphere: Clever sound effects and scene settings recreate the eerie and oppressive environment of a psychiatric hospital.

  • Solve puzzles: Crucial clues are hidden in riddles — Can you find them?

  • Use the devil's mirror: Let its powerful forces aid you in solving the puzzles.

This game is created by @lz-ink with YAHAHA Horror Game Kit and YAHAHA assists the creator with packaging and publishing the game based on their request. Yahaha Horror Gamekit is tailored for imaginative creators and players who adore horror games, all without the need for any programming expertise.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content.

name: The Devils Mirror

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Intel Core I5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio

short_description: The Devil's Mirror is a first-person indie horror game. Waking up in a psychiatric hospital, the only thing I remember is the departure of my beloved. All the sorrow and pain, only she can soothe. I want her back, no matter the means or the cost!
